exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) Hreducestar : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM p HCombLinear : CombLinear Q q The term "p" has type "list (Term A n)" while it is expected to have type "(A * mon n)%type".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q : list (Term A n)), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> CombLinear Q q -> CombLinear Q p

Premises:

```coq
intros Q p q Hreducestar Hcanon HCombLinear.
apply CombLinear_1 with (a:=p) (q:=q) (s:=p).
- intro Hzero; apply Hcanon; assumption.
- apply inPolySet_refl.
- rewrite <- reducestar_eqp_com with (Q:=Q) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto.
Qed.

original: intros Q p q Hreducestar Hcanon HCombLinear. apply CombLinear_1 with (a:=p) (q:=q) (s:=p). - intro Hzero; apply Hcanon; auto. - apply inPolySet_refl. - rewrite <- reducestar_eqp_com with (Q:=Q) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto.
